name: Starstruck
summary_text: A millennial in London juggling two dead-end jobs and navigating the awkward morning-after-the-night-before when she discovers the complications of accidentally sleeping with a film star.

name: Riverdale
summary_text: While navigating the troubled waters of romance, school and family, Archie and his gang become entangled in dark Riverdale mysteries.

name: Eternals
summary_text: The saga of the Eternals, a race of immortal beings who lived on Earth and shaped its history and civilizations.

name: The Education of Fredrick Fitzell
summary_text: After a chance encounter with a man forgotten from his youth, Fred literally and metaphorically journeys into his past.

name: Succession
summary_text: The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company.

name: Arrow
summary_text: Spoiled billionaire playboy Oliver Queen is missing and presumed dead when his yacht is lost at sea. He returns five years later a changed man, determined to clean up the city as a hooded vigilante armed with a bow.

name: Queen Bees
summary_text: After reluctantly agreeing to move in to a senior's home, a woman encounters a clique of mean-spirited women and an amorous widower.

name: Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.
summary_text: The missions of the Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division.

name: Scam 1992: The Harshad Mehta Story
summary_text: Set in 1980's and 90's Bombay, it follows the life of Harshad Mehta, a stockbroker who took the stock market to dizzying heights and his catastrophic downfall.
Jack Bauer races against the clock to subvert terrorist plots and save his nation from ultimate disaster.

name: The Wolf of Wall Street
summary_text: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

name: The Courier
summary_text: Cold War spy Greville Wynne and his Russian source try to put an end to the Cuban Missile Crisis.

name: In Treatment
summary_text: A psychotherapist questions his abilities and gets help by reuniting with his old therapist, whom he has not seen for ten years.

name: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
summary_text: A young woman, destined to slay vampires, demons and other infernal creatures, deals with her life fighting evil, with the help of her friends.

name: The Croods: A New Age
summary_text: The prehistoric family the Croods are challenged by a rival family the Bettermans, who claim to be better and more evolved.

name: Joker
summary_text: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.

name: Kajillionaire
summary_text: A woman's life is turned upside down when her criminal parents invite an outsider to join them on a major heist they're planning.

name: Family Guy
summary_text: In a wacky Rhode Island town, a dysfunctional family strive to cope with everyday life as they are thrown from one crazy scenario to another.

name: Band of Brothers
summary_text: The story of Easy Company of the U.S. Army 101st Airborne Division, and their mission in World War II Europe, from Operation Overlord, through V-J Day.

name: Love
summary_text: Murphy is an American living in Paris who enters a highly sexually and emotionally charged relationship with Electra. Unaware of the effect it will have on their relationship, they invite their pretty neighbor into their bed.

name: Yesterday
summary_text: A struggling musician realizes he's the only person on Earth who can remember The Beatles after waking up in an alternate timeline where they never existed.

name: The Umbrella Academy
summary_text: A family of former child heroes, now grown apart, must reunite to continue to protect the world.

name: Interstellar
summary_text: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

name: Pose
summary_text: In the New York of the late 80s and early 90s, this is a story of ball culture and the gay and trans community, the raging AIDS crisis and capitalism.

name: The Batman
summary_text: The plot is unknown.

name: Till Death
summary_text: A woman is left handcuffed to her dead husband as part of a sick revenge plot. Unable to unshackle, she has to survive as two killers arrive to finish her off.

name: ER
summary_text: The lives, loves and losses of the doctors and nurses of Chicago's County General Hospital.

name: Parasite
summary_text: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

name: Good Girls
summary_text: Three suburban mothers suddenly find themselves in desperate circumstances and decide to stop playing it safe and risk everything to take their power back.

name: Demon Slayer: Mugen Train
summary_text: After his family was brutally murdered and his sister turned into a demon, Tanjiro Kamado's journey as a demon slayer began. Tanjiro and his comrades embark on a new mission aboard the Mugen Train, on track to despair.

name: Star Trek: Picard
summary_text: Follow-up series to Star Trek: The Next Generation (1987) and Star Trek: Nemesis (2002) that centers on Jean-Luc Picard (Sir Patrick Stewart) in the next chapter of his life.

name: Thor: Ragnarok
summary_text: Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.

name: Knives Out
summary_text: A detective investigates the death of a patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.

name: Jurassic Park
summary_text: A pragmatic paleontologist visiting an almost complete theme park is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

name: Spirit Untamed
summary_text: Lucky Prescott's life is changed forever when she moves from her home in the city to a small frontier town and befriends a wild mustang named Spirit.

name: Rurouni Kenshin: Final Chapter Part I - The Final
summary_text: Kenshin's past catches up to him causing the destruction of Akabeko Restaurant, which was Kenshin's favorite place to eat. There, he finds a note with the word "Junchu" on it.

name: The Dark Knight
summary_text: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
summary_text: After more than thirty years of service as one of the Navy's top aviators, Pete Mitchell is where he belongs, pushing the envelope as a courageous test pilot and dodging the advancement in rank that would ground him.

name: Teen Wolf
summary_text: An average high school student and his best friend get caught up in some trouble causing him to receive a werewolf bite. As a result they find themselves in the middle of all sorts of dramas in Beacon Hills.

name: The Mentalist
summary_text: A famous "psychic" outs himself as a fake, and starts working as a consultant for the California Bureau of Investigation so he can find "Red John", the madman who killed his wife and daughter.

name: Supergirl
summary_text: The adventures of Superman's cousin in her own superhero career.

name: Sherlock
summary_text: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

name: Pulp Fiction
summary_text: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

name: Clueless
summary_text: Shallow, rich and socially successful Cher is at the top of her Beverly Hills high school's pecking scale. Seeing herself as a matchmaker, Cher first coaxes two teachers into dating each other.

name: Security
summary_text: A winter's tale in which an incident disrupts the lives of its characters and changes them forever. When the fear lives inside homes and people, what is the price of security?

name: Death in Paradise
summary_text: A UK police DI is transferred to St-Marie to investigate murders on the island, but he hates the sun, sea, and sand. Later series see other English and Irish detectives take over the role.

name: Riders of Justice
summary_text: Markus, who has to go home to his teenage daughter, Mathilde, when his wife dies in a tragic train accident. It seems like an accident until a mathematics geek, who was also a fellow passenger on the train, and his two colleagues show up.

name: Big Sky
summary_text: A private detective teams up with an ex-cop to solve a kidnapping case in Montana.

name: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
summary_text: Jedi Knights lead the Grand Army of the Republic against the droid army of the Separatists.

name: Soul
summary_text: After landing the gig of a lifetime, a New York jazz pianist suddenly finds himself trapped in a strange land between Earth and the afterlife.

name: Two and a Half Men
summary_text: A hedonistic jingle writer's free-wheeling life comes to an abrupt halt when his brother and 10-year-old nephew move into his beach-front house.

name: Rebel
summary_text: Follows a legal advocate with a blue collar background, who helps those in need without a law degree.

name: True Blood
summary_text: Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.

name: Another Round
summary_text: Four high school teachers consume alcohol on a daily basis to see how it affects their social and professional lives.

name: Walker
summary_text: A widowed father returns to Austin after two years, attempting to reconnect with his children, navigate clashes with his family, and find common ground with his new partner, while growing increasingly suspicious of his wife's death.

name: 9-1-1: Lone Star
summary_text: A New York firefighter relocates to Austin, Texas with his son, where he works to save people's lives while trying to solve his own personal problems.

name: The Gentlemen
summary_text: An American expat tries to sell off his highly profitable marijuana empire in London, triggering plots, schemes, bribery and blackmail in an attempt to steal his domain out from under him.

name: You
summary_text: A dangerously charming, intensely obsessive young man goes to extreme measures to insert himself into the lives of those he is transfixed by.

name: The New Mutants
summary_text: Five young mutants, just discovering their abilities while held in a secret facility against their will, fight to escape their past sins and save themselves.

name: Mr. Robot
summary_text: Elliot, a brilliant but highly unstable young cyber-security engineer and vigilante hacker, becomes a key figure in a complex game of global dominance when he and his shadowy allies try to take down the corrupt corporation he works for.

name: The Fast and the Furious
summary_text: Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Conner must decide where his loyalty really lies when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to destroy.

name: The Girlfriend Experience
summary_text: Anthology television series based on Steven Soderbergh's "The Girlfriend Experience."

name: For All Mankind
summary_text: In an alternative version of 1969, the Soviet Union beats the United States to the Moon, and the space race continues on for decades with still grander challenges and goals.

name: Animal Kingdom
summary_text: Centers on a Southern California family, whose excessive lifestyle is fueled by their criminal activities.

name: Girl in the Basement
summary_text: Sara is a teen girl who is looking forward to her 18th birthday to move away from her controlling father Don. But before she could even blow out the candles, Don imprisons her in the basement of their home.

name: Saving Private Ryan
summary_text: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

name: A Discovery of Witches
summary_text: Diana Bishop, historian and witch, accesses Ashmole 782 and knows she must solve its mysteries. She is offered help by the enigmatic Matthew Clairmont, but he's a vampire and witches should never trust vampires.

name: The Undoing
summary_text: A modern twist to a classical "whodunnit" tale, when the life of a wealthy New York therapist turns upside down after she and her family get involved with a murder case.

name: Xtreme
summary_text: Two years after the murder of his son and father, a retired hitman sets in motion a carefully crafted revenge plan against the killer: his own brother.

name: Domina
summary_text: The life and rise of Livia Drusilla, the powerful wife of the Roman emperor Augustus Caesar.

name: Arrested Development
summary_text: Level-headed son Michael Bluth takes over family affairs after his father is imprisoned. But the rest of his spoiled, dysfunctional family are making his job unbearable.

name: No Time to Die
summary_text: James Bond has left active service. His peace is short-lived when Felix Leiter, an old friend from the CIA, turns up asking for help, leading Bond onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
summary_text: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

name: Dom
summary_text: Follows Victor, a police officer who dedicated his life to fight the narcotraffic war and to help his son Pedro, a drug addict who became one of the most wanted criminals in Brazil.

name: Girls5eva
summary_text: A one-hit-wonder band from the '90s gets a second shot at fame when a young rapper samples their song.

name: Stargate SG-1
summary_text: A secret military team, SG-1, is formed to explore other planets through the recently discovered Stargates.

name: Crazy Rich Asians
summary_text: This contemporary romantic comedy, based on a global bestseller, follows native New Yorker Rachel Chu to Singapore to meet her boyfriend's family.

name: High School Musical: The Musical - The Series
summary_text: The students from the school where the High School Musical films were shot stage a musical production based on the franchise.

name: Dazed and Confused
summary_text: The adventures of high school and junior high students on the last day of school in May 1976.

name: Narcos
summary_text: A chronicled look at the criminal exploits of Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar, as well as the many other drug kingpins who plagued the country through the years.

name: Inception
summary_text: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

name: Call the Midwife
summary_text: Chronicles the lives of a group of midwives living in East London in the late-1950s to late-1960s.

name: Inside No. 9
summary_text: Anthology series which mixes dark humor with genres like crime, horror or drama. The show invites viewers into some very different No.9s, where the ordinary and mundane rub shoulders with the extraordinary and macabre.

name: Love and Monsters
summary_text: Seven years after he survived the monster apocalypse, lovably hapless Joel leaves his cozy underground bunker behind on a quest to reunite with his ex.

name: The Nun
summary_text: A priest with a haunted past and a novice on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate the death of a young nun in Romania and confront a malevolent force in the form of a demonic nun.

name: Star Trek: Discovery
summary_text: Ten years before Kirk, Spock, and the Enterprise, the USS Discovery discovers new worlds and lifeforms as one Starfleet officer learns to understand all things alien.

name: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine
summary_text: In the vicinity of the liberated planet of Bajor, the Federation space station Deep Space Nine guards the opening of a stable wormhole to the far side of the galaxy.

name: Monster Hunter
summary_text: When Lt. Artemis and her loyal soldiers are transported to a new world, they engage in a desperate battle for survival against enormous enemies with incredible powers. Feature film based on the video game by Capcom.

name: Killing Eve
summary_text: After a series of events, the lives of a security operative and an assassin become inextricably linked.

name: Master of None
summary_text: The personal and professional life of Dev, a 30-year-old actor in New York.

name: Psych
summary_text: A novice sleuth is hired by the Police after he cons them into thinking he has psychic powers which help solve crimes. With the assistance of his reluctant best friend, the duo take on a series of complicated cases.

name: Minamata
summary_text: War photographer W. Eugene Smith travels back to Japan where he documents the devastating effect of mercury poisoning in coastal communities.

name: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
summary_text: In a magically realistic version of Toronto, a young man must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes one by one in order to win her heart.

name: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
summary_text: Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.

name: Scream
summary_text: A new installment of the 'Scream' horror franchise will follow a woman returning to her home town to try to find out who has been committing a series of vicious crimes.

name: Castle
summary_text: After a serial killer imitates the plots of his novels, successful mystery novelist Richard "Rick" Castle receives permission from the Mayor of New York City to tag along with an NYPD homicide investigation team for research purposes.

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
summary_text: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

name: The Innocent
summary_text: An accidental killing leads a man down a dark hole of intrigue and murder. Just as he finds love and freedom, one phone call brings back the nightmare.

name: Outer Banks
summary_text: A group of teenagers from the wrong side of the tracks stumble upon a treasure map that unearths a long buried secret.

name: Fight Club
summary_text: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

name: Things Heard & Seen
summary_text: An artist relocates to the Hudson Valley and begins to suspect that her marriage has a sinister darkness, one that rivals her new home's history.

name: Twin Peaks
summary_text: An idiosyncratic FBI agent investigates the murder of a young woman in the even more idiosyncratic town of Twin Peaks.

name: Sex and the City
summary_text: Four female New Yorkers gossip about their sex lives (or lack thereof) and find new ways to deal with being a woman in the late 1990s.

name: Avengers: Infinity War
summary_text: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

name: Doctor Sleep
summary_text: Years following the events of The Shining (1980), a now-adult Dan Torrance must protect a young girl with similar powers from a cult known as The True Knot, who prey on children with powers to remain immortal.

name: Mindhunter
summary_text: Set in the late 1970s, two FBI agents are tasked with interviewing serial killers to solve open cases.

name: The Sinner
summary_text: Anthology series that examines how and why ordinary people commit brutal crimes.

name: Wrong Turn
summary_text: Friends hiking the Appalachian Trail are confronted by 'The Foundation', a community of people who have lived in the mountains for hundreds of years.

name: Spartacus
summary_text: The life of Spartacus, the gladiator who lead a rebellion against the Romans. From his time as an ally of the Romans, to his betrayal and becoming a gladiator, to the rebellion he leads and its ultimate outcome.

name: The Green Knight
summary_text: A fantasy re-telling of the medieval story of Sir Gawain and the Green Knight.

name: Borderlands
summary_text: A feature film based on the popular video game set on the abandoned fictional planet of Pandora where people search for a mysterious relic.

name: The Baker's Son
summary_text: Matt's passion transforms his bread from bland to brilliant. But when his bread loses its magic, the island locals turn to Annie - Matt's childhood friend and true love - for help.

name: Baywatch
summary_text: At a Los Angeles beach, a team of lifeguards led by Lieutenant Mitch Buchannon save lives, deal with personal dramas, fight crime and participate in over the top adventures on a daily basis.

name: Curb Your Enthusiasm
summary_text: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.

name: This Is 40
summary_text: Pete and Debbie are both about to turn 40, their kids hate each other, both of their businesses are failing, they're on the verge of losing their house, and their relationship is threatening to fall apart.

name: Guardians of the Galaxy
summary_text: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

name: Tom Clancy's Without Remorse
summary_text: An elite Navy SEAL, goes on a path to avenge his wife's murder only to find himself inside of a larger conspiracy.

name: Killers of the Flower Moon
summary_text: Members of the Osage tribe in the United States are murdered under mysterious circumstances in the 1920s sparking a major F.B.I. investigation involving J. Edgar Hoover.

name: Gladiator
summary_text: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

name: The Good Place
summary_text: Four people and their otherworldly frienemy struggle in the afterlife to define what it means to be good.

name: Justified
summary_text: U.S. Marshal Raylan Givens is reassigned from Miami to his childhood home in the poor, rural coal mining towns of eastern Kentucky.

name: Who Killed Sara?
summary_text: Hell-bent on exacting revenge and proving he was framed for his sister's murder, Álex sets out to unearth much more than the crime's real culprit.

name: Blue Bloods
summary_text: Revolves around a family of New York cops.

name: WKRP in Cincinnati
summary_text: The misadventures of the staff of a struggling Top 40 rock radio station in Cincinnati, Ohio.

name: SEAL Team
summary_text: The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.

name: The Vault
summary_text: Follows a genius engineering graduate who is interested in the Bank of Spain's safe.

name: The Shrink Next Door
summary_text: The bizarre relationship between psychiatrist and his longtime patient.

name: Ginny & Georgia
summary_text: Ginny Miller, an angsty fifteen-year-old, often feels more mature than her thirty-year-old mother, the irresistible and dynamic Georgia Miller.

name: The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel
summary_text: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

name: Nine Perfect Strangers
summary_text: Adaptation of Liane Moriarty's novel.

name: Prodigal Son
summary_text: Malcolm Bright, one of the best criminal psychologists around, uses his twisted genius to help the NYPD solve crimes.

name: Back to the Future
summary_text: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the eccentric scientist Doc Brown.

name: The Originals
summary_text: A family of power-hungry thousand-year-old vampires look to take back the city that they built and dominate all those who have done them wrong.

name: Jack Ryan
summary_text: An up-and-coming CIA analyst, Jack Ryan, is thrust into a dangerous field assignment as he uncovers a pattern in terrorist communication that launches him into the center of a dangerous gambit.

name: Columbo
summary_text: Los Angeles homicide detective Lieutenant Columbo uses his humble ways and ingenuous demeanor to winkle out even the most well-concealed of crimes.

name: Blade Runner 2049
summary_text: Young Blade Runner K's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

name: Resident Evil: Welcome to Raccoon City
summary_text: Set in 1998, this 'Resident Evil' origin story explains the secrets of the Spencer Mansion and Raccoon City.

name: John Wick
summary_text: An ex-hit-man comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters that killed his dog and took everything from him.

name: Star Trek: Voyager
summary_text: Pulled to the far side of the galaxy, where the Federation is seventy-five years away at maximum warp speed, a Starfleet ship must cooperate with Maquis rebels to find a way home.

name: Desperate Housewives
summary_text: Secrets and truths unfold through the lives of female friends in one suburban neighborhood, after the mysterious suicide of a neighbor.

name: No Country for Old Men
summary_text: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

name: The Terminal
summary_text: An Eastern European tourist unexpectedly finds himself stranded in JFK airport, and must take up temporary residence there.

name: Jack Irish
summary_text: Jack is engaged to find a missing person, only to be later framed for his murder. Jack is quickly caught up in a complex web of powerful vested interests that stretches from his home town of Fitzroy to a remote village in the Philippines.

name: The Flight Attendant
summary_text: A reckless flight attendant with an alcoholism problem wakes up in the wrong hotel, in the wrong bed, with a dead man - and no idea what happened. Unable to piece the night together, she begins to wonder if she could be the killer.

name: The Serpent
summary_text: The twisting, real-life story of Charles Sobhraj, a murderer, thief and seductive master of disguise, who was a hidden darkness in the mid-70's on Asia's hippie trail.

name: The House Next Door: Meet the Blacks 2
summary_text: When best selling author Carl Black moves his family back to his childhood home, he must team up with oddball neighbors to do battle with a pimp, who may or may not be an actual vampire.

name: The Greatest Showman
summary_text: Celebrates the birth of show business and tells of a visionary who rose from nothing to create a spectacle that became a worldwide sensation.

name: Cold Case
summary_text: The Philadelphia homicide squad's lone female detective finds her calling when she's assigned "cold cases", older crimes that have never been solved.

name: Braveheart
summary_text: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

name: Pretty Little Liars
summary_text: Four friends band together against an anonymous foe who threatens to reveal their darkest secrets, while also investigating the disappearance of their best friend.

name: The Departed
summary_text: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

name: Dawson's Creek
summary_text: Four friends in a small coastal town help each other cope with adolescence.

name: Gossip Girl
summary_text: Privileged teens living on the Upper East Side of New York can hide no secret from the ruthless blogger who is always watching.

name: Big Little Lies
summary_text: The apparently perfect lives of upper-class mothers, at a prestigious elementary school, unravel to the point of murder when a single-mother moves to their quaint Californian beach town.

name: Eyes Wide Shut
summary_text: A New York City doctor embarks on a harrowing, night-long odyssey of sexual and moral discovery after his wife reveals a painful secret to him.

name: The Underground Railroad
summary_text: A young woman named Cora makes an amazing discovery during her attempt to break free from slavery in the deep south.

name: 12 Mighty Orphans
summary_text: Haunted by his mysterious past, a devoted high school football coach leads a scrawny team of orphans to the state championship during the Great Depression and inspires a broken nation along the way.

name: Bob's Burgers
summary_text: Bob Belcher runs his dream restaurant with his wife and three children as their last hope of holding the family together.

name: Taxi Driver
summary_text: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action by attempting to liberate a presidential campaign worker and an underage prostitute.

name: Van Helsing
summary_text: Vanessa Helsing, distant relative of famous vampire hunter Abraham Van Helsing, is resurrected only to find that vampires have taken over the world.

name: M*A*S*H
summary_text: The staff of an Army hospital in the Korean War find that laughter is the best way to deal with their situation.

name: The Nanny
summary_text: After being fired from her job and dumped by her boyfriend, a cosmetics saleswoman becomes the nanny to the three children of a rich English widower. As time passes, the two fall for each other.

name: Poirot
summary_text: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

name: Bad Times at the El Royale
summary_text: Early 1970s. Four strangers check in at the El Royale Hotel. The hotel is deserted, staffed by a single desk clerk. Some of the new guests' reasons for being there are less than innocent and some are not who they appear to be.

name: Spider-Man: Far from Home
summary_text: Following the events of Avengers: Endgame (2019), Spider-Man must step up to take on new threats in a world that has changed forever.

name: The O.C.
summary_text: A troubled youth becomes embroiled in the lives of a close-knit group of people in the wealthy, upper-class neighborhood of Newport Beach, Orange County, California.

name: One Tree Hill
summary_text: Half-brothers Lucas and Nathan Scott trade between kinship and rivalry both on the basketball court and in the hearts of their friends in the small, but not so quiet town of Tree Hill, North Carolina.

name: The Silence of the Lambs
summary_text: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

name: Glee
summary_text: A group of ambitious misfits try to escape the harsh realities of high school by joining a glee club headed by a passionate Spanish teacher.

name: Dynasty
summary_text: Follows two of America's wealthiest families as they feud for control over their fortune and their children.

name: Murder, She Wrote
summary_text: Professional writer and amateur sleuth Jessica Fletcher uses her intellect, charm, and persistence to get to the bottom of every crime she encounters.

name: Flipped
summary_text: Two eighth-graders start to have feelings for each other despite being total opposites.

name: Smallville
summary_text: A young Clark Kent struggles to find his place in the world as he learns to harness his alien powers for good and deals with the typical troubles of teenage life in Smallville, Kansas.

name: Inglourious Basterds
summary_text: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

name: Frasier
summary_text: Dr. Frasier Crane moves back to his hometown of Seattle, where he lives with his father, and works as a radio psychiatrist.

name: Anne Boleyn
summary_text: The final months of Boleyn's life, her struggle with Tudor England's patriarchal society, her desire to secure a future for her daughter, Elizabeth, and the brutal reality of her failure to provide Henry with a male heir.

name: Boss Level
summary_text: A retired Special Forces officer is trapped in a never-ending time loop on the day of his death.

name: Fear Street Part 1: 1994
summary_text: A circle of teenage friends accidentally encounter the ancient evil responsible for a series of brutal murders that have plagued their town for over 300 years. Welcome to Shadyside.

name: I Care a Lot
summary_text: A crooked legal guardian who drains the savings of her elderly wards meets her match when a woman she tries to swindle turns out to be more than she first appears.

name: Shutter Island
summary_text: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

name: Tombstone
summary_text: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

name: Thor
summary_text: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.

name: The Matrix
summary_text: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

name: Young Sheldon
summary_text: Meet a child genius named Sheldon Cooper; (already seen as an adult in The Big Bang Theory (2007)) and his family. Some unique challenges face Sheldon who seems socially impaired.

name: On Becoming a God in Central Florida
summary_text: In 1992 Central Florida, a minimum-wage water park employee lies, schemes, and cons her way up the ranks of the cultish, multibillion-dollar pyramid scheme that drove her family to ruin.

name: NCIS: New Orleans
summary_text: Follows an NCIS team that investigates criminal cases involving military personnel in The Big Easy, a city known for its music, entertainment, and decadence.

name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
summary_text: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

name: Gotham
summary_text: The story behind Detective James Gordon's rise to prominence in Gotham City in the years before Batman's arrival.

name: Forrest Gump
summary_text: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

name: Fifty Shades of Grey
summary_text: Literature student Anastasia Steele's life changes forever when she meets handsome, yet tormented, billionaire Christian Grey.

name: The Punisher
summary_text: After the murder of his family, Marine veteran Frank Castle becomes the vigilante known as "The Punisher," with only one goal in mind: to avenge them.

name: Avatar
summary_text: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

name: Avatar: The Last Airbender
summary_text: In a war-torn world of elemental magic, a young boy reawakens to undertake a dangerous mystic quest to fulfill his destiny as the Avatar, and bring peace to the world.

name: Goodfellas
summary_text: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

name: NCIS: Los Angeles
summary_text: The Naval Criminal Investigation Service's Office of Special Projects takes on the undercover work and the hard to crack cases in LA. Key agents are G. Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks.

name: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
summary_text: A group of misfits enter a Las Vegas dodgeball tournament in order to save their cherished local gym from the onslaught of a corporate health fitness chain.

name: The Gift
summary_text: A painter in Istanbul embarks on a personal journey as she unearths universal secrets about an Anatolian archaeological site and its link to her past.

name: Monk
summary_text: The series follows Adrian Monk, a brilliant former San Francisco detective, who now consults the police as a private consultant who battles with an obsessive-compulsive disorder.

name: South Park
summary_text: Follows the misadventures of four irreverent grade-schoolers in the quiet, dysfunctional town of South Park, Colorado.

name: The Republic of Sarah
summary_text: Faced with the destruction of her town at the hands of a greedy mining company, rebellious high school teacher Sarah Cooper utilizes an obscure cartographical loophole to declare independence.

name: The Fall
summary_text: A seemingly cold but very passionate policewoman goes head to head with a seemingly passionate father who is in fact a cold serial killer in this procedural out of Belfast. The only thing they share is their common complexity.

name: Chicago Med
summary_text: The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships.

name: It
summary_text: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town.

name: Hereditary
summary_text: A grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences.

name: Jennifer's Body
summary_text: A newly possessed high school cheerleader turns into a succubus who specializes in killing her male classmates. Can her best friend put an end to the horror?

name: Joe Bell
summary_text: The true story of a small town, working class father who embarks on a solo walk across the U.S. to crusade against bullying after his son is tormented in high school for being gay.

name: The Dead Don't Die
summary_text: The peaceful town of Centerville finds itself battling a zombie horde as the dead start rising from their graves.

name: Banshee
summary_text: An ex-con assumes the identity of a murdered sheriff in the small town of Banshee, Pennsylvania; where he has some unfinished business.

name: West Side Story
summary_text: An adaptation of the 1957 musical, West Side Story explores forbidden love and the rivalry between the Jets and the Sharks, two teenage street gangs of different ethnic backgrounds.

name: Daredevil
summary_text: A blind lawyer by day, vigilante by night. Matt Murdock fights the crime of New York as Daredevil.

name: Oxygen
summary_text: A woman wakes in a cryogenic chamber with no recollection of how she got there. As she's running out of oxygen, she must rebuild her memory to find a way out of her nightmare.

name: Shooter
summary_text: A marksman living in exile is coaxed back into action after learning of a plot to kill the President. After being double crossed for the attempt and on the run, he sets out for the real killer and the truth.

name: 101 Dalmatians
summary_text: An evil high-fashion designer plots to steal Dalmatian puppies in order to make an extravagant fur coat, but instead creates an extravagant mess.

name: The Resident
summary_text: A group of doctors at Chastain Memorial Hospital face personal and professional challenges on a daily basis.

name: Broadchurch
summary_text: The murder of a young boy in a small coastal town brings a media frenzy, which threatens to tear the community apart.

name: All American
summary_text: When a star high school football player from South Central is recruited to play for Beverly Hills High School, two separate worlds collide.

name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
summary_text: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

name: The Goonies
summary_text: A group of young misfits called The Goonies discover an ancient map and set out on an adventure to find a legendary pirate's long-lost treasure.

name: Sex/Life
summary_text: A suburban mother of two takes a fantasy-charged trip down memory lane that sets her very married present on a collision course with her wild-child past.

name: Station 19
summary_text: This spinoff of the critically acclaimed show Grey's Anatomy follows the lives of the men and women of firehouse station 19 in Seattle, Washington.

name: Letterkenny
summary_text: Quick-witted, fast-paced snappy comedy about rural folk getting by in a small town.

name: Dream Horse
summary_text: Dream Alliance is an unlikely race horse bred by small-town Welsh bartender Jan Vokes. With no experience, Jan convinces her neighbors to chip in their meager earnings to help raise Dream in the hopes he can compete with the racing elites.

name: Hotel Transylvania: Transformania
summary_text: Drac's Pack is back, like you've never seen them before in the final chapter of 'Hotel Transylvania'.

name: Annabelle Comes Home
summary_text: While babysitting the daughter of Ed and Lorraine Warren, a teenager and her friend unknowingly awaken an evil spirit trapped in a doll.

name: Moana
summary_text: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.

name: Blue Miracle
summary_text: To save their cash-strapped orphanage, a guardian and his kids partner with a washed-up boat captain for a chance to win a lucrative fishing competition.

name: Django Unchained
summary_text: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation-owner in Mississippi.

name: Deadpool
summary_text: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.

name: House of Cards
summary_text: A Congressman works with his equally conniving wife to exact revenge on the people who betrayed him.

name: Se7en
summary_text: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

name: Jane the Virgin
summary_text: A young, devout Catholic woman discovers that she was accidentally artificially inseminated.

name: The Goldbergs
summary_text: This ABC show takes place in Jenkintown, Pennsylvania in the 1980s and follows the lives of a family named The Goldbergs.

name: Sound of Metal
summary_text: A heavy-metal drummer's life is thrown into freefall when he begins to lose his hearing.

name: The Stand
summary_text: After the world is in ruins, due to a man-made plague, a battle of Biblical proportions ensues between the survivors.

name: Jujutsu Kaisen
summary_text: A boy swallows a cursed talisman - the finger of a demon - and becomes cursed himself. He enters a shaman's school to be able to locate the demon's other body parts and thus exorcise himself.

name: EuroTrip
summary_text: Dumped by his girlfriend, a high school grad decides to embark on an overseas adventure in Europe with his friends.

name: The Dry
summary_text: Aaron Falk returns to his drought-stricken hometown to attend a tragic funeral. But his return opens a decades-old wound - the unsolved death of a teenage girl.

name: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
summary_text: Harry Potter finds himself competing in a hazardous tournament between rival schools of magic, but he is distracted by recurring nightmares.

name: Ship of Fools
summary_text: A varied group of passengers boarding a ship bound for pre-WWII Germany represents a microcosm of early 1930s society.

name: Avatar 2
summary_text: A sequel to Avatar (2009).

name: Schindler's List
summary_text: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

name: How to Make a Monster
summary_text: When a master monster make-up artist is sacked by the new bosses of American International studios, he uses his creations to exact revenge.

name: The Mauritanian
summary_text: Mohamedou Ould Slahi fights for freedom after being detained and imprisoned without charge by the U.S. Government for years.

name: The Avengers
summary_text: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

name: The Hunger Games
summary_text: Katniss Everdeen voluntarily takes her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games: a televised competition in which two teenagers from each of the twelve Districts of Panem are chosen at random to fight to the death.

name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
summary_text: In 1938, after his father Professor Henry Jones, Sr. goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Professor Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. finds himself up against Adolf Hitler's Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.

name: The Outpost
summary_text: A small team of U.S. soldiers battle against hundreds of Taliban fighters in Afghanistan.

name: Fringe
summary_text: An F.B.I. agent is forced to work with an institutionalized scientist and his son in order to rationalize a brewing storm of unexplained phenomena.

name: Mad Max: Fury Road
summary_text: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.

name: Suicide Squad
summary_text: A secret government agency recruits some of the most dangerous incarcerated super-villains to form a defensive task force. Their first mission: save the world from the apocalypse.
